name: Reminder
flavor: Because it's coming up too often...
text:
- Please respect our rules in https://discord.com/channels/1271249120526602342/1271252429677002873 
- Be friendly about other servers. Don't come here expecting that slandering other places would be cool. There's a good chance we're friends with them.
- If there are problems with the bot, please ping the Bot Manager role in the channel where you need help.
- If you think, things should be handled differently, write a poem inside https://discord.com/channels/1271249120526602342/1271260862346166272 
- We're very open about how we handle things in our world.
- GMs are allowed to use anything they want in their quests. Don't dictate GMs what they should use inside their quests.
- You can always contribute to the server yourself by running your own quests or brainstorming together with the team in https://discord.com/channels/1271249120526602342/1271260862346166272
